channel.title: music on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in music on D00k

item.title: Now
item.description: April 2022 ∙ Learning digital art using Krita. ∙ Modifying an iPod Classic. ∙ Working on a Minecraft Museum. ∙ Burning loads of CDs to Digital for my music collection. ∙ Mostly taking the month to rest and get back on my toes after a terrible health month. What’s Playing? ∙ Vibing to Yot Club’s album, Bipolar. ∙ Re-watching some Ghibli movies. ∙ Still playing Pokemon Legends Arceus.
